identity.name: DevSocial
identity.vibe: Cyberpunk meets VS Code. Serious, high-contrast, immersive.
principles: Code is Art: Syntax highlighting colors are the primary palette.
Terminal Aesthetics: Monospace headings, command-line prompts.
Focus Mode: Deep blacks, no distractions, high contrast.
Fluidity: Social media smoothness (60fps) with developer precision.

buttons.style: sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md), solid colors, no gradients for secondary actions.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
3. FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the 'dark' class is always applied to the html/body tag, or default to dark variables.
4. CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-xl' with 'rounded-md' to match the developer aesthetic.
5. USE ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Keep them thin (stroke-width={1.5}).
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
7. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Avoid gradient text for body content. Use it ONLY for the main hero title.
8. LAYOUT: Use a sticky sidebar on the left for desktop, bottom nav for mobile.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
